content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Apr 2019What would be a good investment portfolio to build after having set aside savings, CPF, SSB and annuity?1 answerAnswerBump0

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019A globally diversified one. You can set one up using traditional Financial advisors or Robo Advisors.You'll go through a risk assessment and be recommended an asset allocation that you can stick with or adjust. But of course you can DIY and save yourself the annual advisory fee.1 comment3
